mapper.select: select project_id as no, title, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate from myapp_projects order by project_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into myapp_projects(title, description, start_date, end_date) values(#{title}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select project_id as no, title, description, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate from myapp_projects where project_id = ${no}
mapper.update: update myapp_projects set title = #{title}, description = #{description}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate} where project_id = #{no}
mapper.select: select pm.user_id as no, u.name from myapp_project_members pm inner join myapp_users u on pm.user_id = u.user_id where pm.project_id = #{no}
